meanings.definition: The quality of being able to be tuned or adjusted.
meanings.sent1: The tunablenesses of the radio allowed me to find my favorite station easily.
meanings.sent2: Musical instruments often have tunablenesses to ensure they sound just right.
meanings.sent3: I wish my alarm clock had the tunablenesses to wake me up gradually with soothing music.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had the tunablenesses of a well-tuned piano, hitting all the right notes effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The tunablenesses of the telescope made it easy to focus on distant stars.

meanings.definition: The state of being capable of being modified or altered.
meanings.sent1: The tunablenesses of the recipe allowed me to adjust the flavors to my liking.
meanings.sent2: Technology constantly evolves due to its tunablenesses to meet changing needs.
meanings.sent3: His excuses had the tunablenesses of a chameleon, changing color with each retelling.
meanings.sent4: The tunablenesses of her personality made her a versatile and adaptable team member.
meanings.sent5: The tunablenesses of the weather made it unpredictable and ever-changing.
